databaseSpecificDependencies.// NOTE: Enable one or more of these to test the corresponding database client.

description: A dirt-simple SQL client abstraction (currently) supporting PostgreSQL, MySQL and SQLite.
name: sql-client

scripts.test: mocha -t 2000  -R list --require coffeescript/register test/test-connection-factory.coffee test/test-index.coffee test/test-sql-client-pool.coffee test/test-sql-client.coffee test/test-mysql-client.coffee test/test-postgresql-client.coffee test/test-postgresql-client2.coffee test/test-sqlite3-client.coffee
scripts.test-all: mocha -t 2000  -R list --require coffeescript/register test/test-connection-factory.coffee test/test-index.coffee test/test-sql-client-pool.coffee test/test-sql-client.coffee test/test-mysql-client.coffee test/test-postgresql-client.coffee test/test-postgresql-client2.coffee test/test-sqlite3-client.coffee
scripts.test-mysql: mocha -t 2000  -R list --require coffeescript/register test/test-connection-factory.coffee test/test-index.coffee test/test-sql-client-pool.coffee test/test-sql-client.coffee test/test-mysql-client.coffee
scripts.test-nodb: mocha -t 2000  -R list --require coffeescript/register test/test-connection-factory.coffee test/test-index.coffee test/test-sql-client-pool.coffee test/test-sql-client.coffee
scripts.test-pg: mocha -t 2000  -R list --require coffeescript/register test/test-connection-factory.coffee test/test-index.coffee test/test-sql-client-pool.coffee test/test-sql-client.coffee test/test-postgresql-client.coffee test/test-postgresql-client2.coffee
scripts.test-sqlite: mocha -t 2000  -R list --require coffeescript/register test/test-connection-factory.coffee test/test-index.coffee test/test-sql-client-pool.coffee test/test-sql-client.coffee test/test-sqlite3-client.coffee
